view.label: Clientes por producto Periodo
view.sqlSentence: SELECT registry.id, document, registry.name, registry.alias, SUM(IF(invoice.issue_date BETWEEN ? AND ?, TRUNCATE(invoice_detail.taxable_base, 2), 0)), SUM(IF(invoice.issue_date BETWEEN ? AND ?, 0, TRUNCATE(invoice_detail.taxable_base, 2))) FROM registry, invoice, invoice_detail, item, product WHERE invoice.registry = registry.id AND invoice.id = invoice_detail.invoice AND invoice_detail.item = item.id AND item.product = product.id AND item.id = ? AND ( invoice.issue_date BETWEEN ? AND ? OR invoice.issue_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(?, INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND DATE_SUB(?, INTERVAL 1 YEAR) ) AND invoice.type = ? GROUP BY 1,2,3,4
